name: @magemaclean/azure-devops-mcp
description: Manage Azure DevOps projects, work items, repos, pipelines, wikis, search, and test plans from your coding workflow. Create and update work items, branches, pull requests, and wiki pages; run pipelines; and fetch build statuses, logs, and results on demand. Select only the capabilities you need to keep your workspace focused and fast.

tools.name: core_list_project_teams
tools.description: Retrieve a list of teams for the specified Azure DevOps project.

top.description: The maximum number of teams to return. Defaults to 100.

mine.description: If true, only return teams that the authenticated user is a member of.

skip.description: The number of teams to skip for pagination. Defaults to 0.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

tools.name: core_list_projects
tools.description: Retrieve a list of projects in your Azure DevOps organization.

top.description: The maximum number of projects to return. Defaults to 100.

skip.description: The number of projects to skip for pagination. Defaults to 0.

stateFilter.description: Filter projects by their state. Defaults to 'wellFormed'.

continuationToken.description: Continuation token for pagination. Used to fetch the next set of results if available.

projectNameFilter.description: Filter projects by name. Supports partial matches.

tools.name: core_get_identity_ids
tools.description: Retrieve Azure DevOps identity IDs for a provided search filter.

searchFilter.description: Search filter (unique name, display name, email) to retrieve identity IDs for.

tools.name: work_list_team_iterations
tools.description: Retrieve a list of iterations for a specific team in a project.

team.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps team.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

timeframe.description: The timeframe for which to retrieve iterations. Currently, only 'current' is supported.

tools.name: work_create_iterations
tools.description: Create new iterations in a specified Azure DevOps project.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

startDate.description: The start date of the iteration in ISO format (e.g., '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z'). Optional.

finishDate.description: The finish date of the iteration in ISO format (e.g., '2023-01-31T23:59:59Z'). Optional.

iterationName.description: The name of the iteration to create.

iterations.description: An array of iterations to create. Each iteration must have a name and can optionally have start and finish dates in ISO format.

tools.name: work_assign_iterations
tools.description: Assign existing iterations to a specific team in a project.

team.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps team.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

path.description: The path of the iteration to assign, e.g., 'Project/Iteration'.

identifier.description: The identifier of the iteration to assign.

iterations.description: An array of iterations to assign. Each iteration must have an identifier and a path.

tools.name: pipelines_get_build_definitions
tools.description: Retrieves a list of build definitions for a given project.

top.description: Maximum number of build definitions to return

name.description: Name of the build definition to filter

path.description: Path of the build definition to filter

project.description: Project ID or name to get build definitions for

builtAfter.description: Return definitions that have builds after this date

queryOrder.description: Order in which build definitions are returned

processType.description: Process type to filter build definitions

repositoryId.description: Repository ID to filter build definitions

taskIdFilter.description: Task ID to filter build definitions

yamlFilename.description: YAML filename to filter build definitions

definitionIds.description: Array of build definition IDs to filter

notBuiltAfter.description: Return definitions that do not have builds after this date

minMetricsTime.description: Minimum metrics time to filter build definitions

repositoryType.description: Type of repository to filter build definitions

includeLatestBuilds.description: Whether to include the latest builds for each definition

includeAllProperties.description: Whether to include all properties in the results

tools.name: pipelines_get_build_definition_revisions
tools.description: Retrieves a list of revisions for a specific build definition.

project.description: Project ID or name to get the build definition revisions for

definitionId.description: ID of the build definition to get revisions for

tools.name: pipelines_get_builds
tools.description: Retrieves a list of builds for a given project.

top.description: Maximum number of builds to return

queues.description: Array of queue IDs to filter builds

maxTime.description: Maximum finish time to filter builds

minTime.description: Minimum finish time to filter builds

project.description: Project ID or name to get builds for

buildIds.description: Array of build IDs to retrieve

properties.description: Array of property names to include in the results

queryOrder.description: Order in which builds are returned

tagFilters.description: Array of tags to filter builds

definitions.description: Array of build definition IDs to filter builds

reasonFilter.description: Reason filter for the build (see BuildReason enum)

requestedFor.description: User ID or name who requested the build

resultFilter.description: Result filter for the build (see BuildResult enum)

statusFilter.description: Status filter for the build (see BuildStatus enum)

deletedFilter.description: Filter for deleted builds (see QueryDeletedOption enum)

repositoryType.description: Type of repository to filter builds

maxBuildsPerDefinition.description: Maximum number of builds per definition

tools.name: pipelines_get_build_log
tools.description: Retrieves the logs for a specific build.

buildId.description: ID of the build to get the log for

project.description: Project ID or name to get the build log for

tools.name: pipelines_get_build_log_by_id
tools.description: Get a specific build log by log ID.

logId.description: ID of the log to retrieve

buildId.description: ID of the build to get the log for

endLine.description: Ending line number for the log content, defaults to the end of the log

project.description: Project ID or name to get the build log for

startLine.description: Starting line number for the log content, defaults to 0

tools.name: pipelines_get_build_changes
tools.description: Get the changes associated with a specific build.

top.description: Number of changes to retrieve, defaults to 100

buildId.description: ID of the build to get changes for

project.description: Project ID or name to get the build changes for

includeSourceChange.description: Whether to include source changes in the results, defaults to false

tools.name: pipelines_get_run
tools.description: Gets a run for a particular pipeline.

runId.description: ID of the run to get

project.description: Project ID or name to run the build in

pipelineId.description: ID of the pipeline to run

tools.name: pipelines_list_runs
tools.description: Gets top 10000 runs for a particular pipeline.

project.description: Project ID or name to run the build in

pipelineId.description: ID of the pipeline to run

tools.name: pipelines_run_pipeline
tools.description: Starts a new run of a pipeline.

project.description: Project ID or name to run the build in

runId.description: Id of the source pipeline run that triggered or is referenced by this pipeline run.

version.description: Version of the source pipeline run.
Version of the repository resource, git commit sha.

resources.description: A dictionary of resources to pass to the pipeline.

variables.description: A dictionary of variables to pass to the pipeline.

pipelineId.description: ID of the pipeline to run

previewRun.description: If true, returns the final YAML document after parsing templates without creating a new run.

stagesToSkip.description: A list of stages to skip.

yamlOverride.description: YAML override for the pipeline run.

pipelineVersion.description: Version of the pipeline to run. If not provided, the latest version will be used.

templateParameters.description: Custom build parameters as key-value pairs

tools.name: pipelines_get_build_status
tools.description: Fetches the status of a specific build.

buildId.description: ID of the build to get the status for

project.description: Project ID or name to get the build status for

tools.name: pipelines_update_build_stage
tools.description: Updates the stage of a specific build.

buildId.description: ID of the build to update

project.description: Project ID or name to update the build stage for

stageName.description: Name of the stage to update

forceRetryAllJobs.description: Whether to force retry all jobs in the stage.

tools.name: repo_create_pull_request
tools.description: Create a new pull request.

title.description: The title of the pull request.

isDraft.description: Indicates whether the pull request is a draft. Defaults to false.

workItems.description: Work item IDs to associate with the pull request, space-separated.

description.description: The description of the pull request. Optional.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request will be created.

sourceRefName.description: The source branch name for the pull request, e.g., 'refs/heads/feature-branch'.

targetRefName.description: The target branch name for the pull request, e.g., 'refs/heads/main'.

forkSourceRepositoryId.description: The ID of the fork repository that the pull request originates from. Optional, used when creating a pull request from a fork.

tools.name: repo_create_branch
tools.description: Create a new branch in the repository.

branchName.description: The name of the new branch to create, e.g., 'feature-branch'.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the branch will be created.

sourceCommitId.description: The commit ID to create the branch from. If not provided, uses the latest commit of the source branch.

sourceBranchName.description: The name of the source branch to create the new branch from. Defaults to 'main'.

tools.name: repo_update_pull_request
tools.description: Update a Pull Request by ID with specified fields, including setting autocomplete with various completion options.

title.description: The new title for the pull request.

status.description: The new status of the pull request. Can be 'Active' or 'Abandoned'.

isDraft.description: Whether the pull request should be a draft.

description.description: The new description for the pull request.

autoComplete.description: Set the pull request to autocomplete when all requirements are met.

bypassReason.description: Reason for bypassing branch policies. When provided, branch policies will be automatically bypassed during autocompletion.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request exists.

mergeStrategy.description: The merge strategy to use when the pull request autocompletes. Defaults to 'NoFastForward'.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request to update.

deleteSourceBranch.description: Whether to delete the source branch when the pull request autocompletes. Defaults to false.

transitionWorkItems.description: Whether to transition associated work items to the next state when the pull request autocompletes. Defaults to true.

tools.name: repo_update_pull_request_reviewers
tools.description: Add or remove reviewers for an existing pull request.

action.description: Action to perform on the reviewers. Can be 'add' or 'remove'.

reviewerIds.description: List of reviewer ids to add or remove from the pull request.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request exists.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request to update.

tools.name: repo_list_repos_by_project
tools.description: Retrieve a list of repositories for a given project

top.description: The maximum number of repositories to return.

skip.description: The number of repositories to skip. Defaults to 0.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

repoNameFilter.description: Optional filter to search for repositories by name. If provided, only repositories with names containing this string will be returned.

tools.name: repo_list_pull_requests_by_repo_or_project
tools.description: Retrieve a list of pull requests for a given repository. Either repositoryId or project must be provided.

top.description: The maximum number of pull requests to return.

skip.description: The number of pull requests to skip.

status.description: Filter pull requests by status. Defaults to 'Active'.

project.description: The ID of the project where the pull requests are located.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull requests are located.

created_by_me.description: Filter pull requests created by the current user.

i_am_reviewer.description: Filter pull requests where the current user is a reviewer.

sourceRefName.description: Filter pull requests from this source branch (e.g., 'refs/heads/feature-branch').

targetRefName.description: Filter pull requests into this target branch (e.g., 'refs/heads/main').

created_by_user.description: Filter pull requests created by a specific user (provide email or unique name). Takes precedence over created_by_me if both are provided.

user_is_reviewer.description: Filter pull requests where a specific user is a reviewer (provide email or unique name). Takes precedence over i_am_reviewer if both are provided.

tools.name: repo_list_pull_request_threads
tools.description: Retrieve a list of comment threads for a pull request.

top.description: The maximum number of threads to return.

skip.description: The number of threads to skip.

project.description: Project ID or project name (optional)

iteration.description: The iteration ID for which to retrieve threads. Optional, defaults to the latest iteration.

fullResponse.description: Return full thread JSON response instead of trimmed data.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request is located.

baseIteration.description: The base iteration ID for which to retrieve threads. Optional, defaults to the latest base iteration.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request for which to retrieve threads.

tools.name: repo_list_pull_request_thread_comments
tools.description: Retrieve a list of comments in a pull request thread.

top.description: The maximum number of comments to return.

skip.description: The number of comments to skip.

project.description: Project ID or project name (optional)

threadId.description: The ID of the thread for which to retrieve comments.

fullResponse.description: Return full comment JSON response instead of trimmed data.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request is located.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request for which to retrieve thread comments.

tools.name: repo_list_branches_by_repo
tools.description: Retrieve a list of branches for a given repository.

top.description: The maximum number of branches to return. Defaults to 100.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the branches are located.

filterContains.description: Filter to find branches that contain this string in their name.

tools.name: repo_list_my_branches_by_repo
tools.description: Retrieve a list of my branches for a given repository Id.

top.description: The maximum number of branches to return.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the branches are located.

filterContains.description: Filter to find branches that contain this string in their name.

tools.name: repo_get_repo_by_name_or_id
tools.description: Get the repository by project and repository name or ID.

project.description: Project name or ID where the repository is located.

tools.name: repo_get_branch_by_name
tools.description: Get a branch by its name.

branchName.description: The name of the branch to retrieve, e.g., 'main' or 'feature-branch'.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the branch is located.

tools.name: repo_get_pull_request_by_id
tools.description: Get a pull request by its ID.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request is located.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request to retrieve.

includeWorkItemRefs.description: Whether to reference work items associated with the pull request.

tools.name: repo_reply_to_comment
tools.description: Replies to a specific comment on a pull request.

content.description: The content of the comment to be added.

project.description: Project ID or project name (optional)

threadId.description: The ID of the thread to which the comment will be added.

fullResponse.description: Return full comment JSON response instead of a simple confirmation message.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request is located.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request where the comment thread exists.

tools.name: repo_create_pull_request_thread
tools.description: Creates a new comment thread on a pull request.

status.description: The status of the comment thread. Defaults to 'Active'.

content.description: The content of the comment to be added.

project.description: Project ID or project name (optional)

filePath.description: The path of the file where the comment thread will be created. (optional)

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request is located.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request where the comment thread exists.

rightFileEndLine.description: Position of last character of the thread's span in right file. The line number of a thread's position. Starts at 1. Must only be set if rightFileStartLine is also specified. (optional)

rightFileEndOffset.description: Position of last character of the thread's span in right file. The character offset of a thread's position inside of a line. Must only be set if rightFileEndLine is also specified. (optional)

rightFileStartLine.description: Position of first character of the thread's span in right file. The line number of a thread's position. Starts at 1. (optional)

rightFileStartOffset.description: Position of first character of the thread's span in right file. The line number of a thread's position. The character offset of a thread's position inside of a line. Starts at 1. Must only be set if rightFileStartLine is also specified. (optional)

tools.name: repo_resolve_comment
tools.description: Resolves a specific comment thread on a pull request.

threadId.description: The ID of the thread to be resolved.

fullResponse.description: Return full thread JSON response instead of a simple confirmation message.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository where the pull request is located.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request where the comment thread exists.

tools.name: repo_search_commits
tools.description: Searches for commits in a repository

top.description: Maximum number of commits to return

project.description: Project name or ID

version.description: The name of the branch, tag or commit to filter commits by

versionType.description: The meaning of the version parameter, e.g., branch, tag or commit

tools.name: repo_list_pull_requests_by_commits
tools.description: Lists pull requests by commit IDs to find which pull requests contain specific commits

commits.description: Array of commit IDs to query for

project.description: Project name or ID

tools.name: wit_list_backlogs
tools.description: Revieve a list of backlogs for a given project and team.

team.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps team.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

tools.name: wit_list_backlog_work_items
tools.description: Retrieve a list of backlogs of for a given project, team, and backlog category

team.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps team.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

backlogId.description: The ID of the backlog category to retrieve work items from.

tools.name: wit_my_work_items
tools.description: Retrieve a list of work items relevent to the authenticated user.

top.description: The maximum number of work items to return. Defaults to 50.

type.description: The type of work items to retrieve. Defaults to 'assignedtome'.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

includeCompleted.description: Whether to include completed work items. Defaults to false.

tools.name: wit_get_work_items_batch_by_ids
tools.description: Retrieve list of work items by IDs in batch.

ids.description: The IDs of the work items to retrieve.

fields.description: Optional list of fields to include in the response. If not provided, a hardcoded default set of fields will be used.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

tools.name: wit_get_work_item
tools.description: Get a single work item by ID.

id.description: The ID of the work item to retrieve.

asOf.description: Optional date string to retrieve the work item as of a specific time. If not provided, the current state will be returned.

expand.description: Expand options include 'all', 'fields', 'links', 'none', and 'relations'. Relations can be used to get child workitems. Defaults to 'none'.

fields.description: Optional list of fields to include in the response. If not provided, all fields will be returned.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

tools.name: wit_list_work_item_comments
tools.description: Retrieve list of comments for a work item by ID.

top.description: Optional number of comments to retrieve. Defaults to all comments.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

workItemId.description: The ID of the work item to retrieve comments for.

tools.name: wit_add_work_item_comment
tools.description: Add comment to a work item by ID.

comment.description: The text of the comment to add to the work item.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

workItemId.description: The ID of the work item to add a comment to.

tools.name: wit_add_child_work_items
tools.description: Create one or many child work items from a parent by work item type and parent id.

title.description: The title of the child work item.

format.description: Format for the description on the child work item, e.g., 'Markdown', 'Html'. Defaults to 'Html'.

areaPath.description: Optional area path for the child work item.

description.description: The description of the child work item.

iterationPath.description: Optional iteration path for the child work item.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

parentId.description: The ID of the parent work item to create a child work item under.

workItemType.description: The type of the child work item to create.

tools.name: wit_link_work_item_to_pull_request
tools.description: Link a single work item to an existing pull request.

projectId.description: The project ID of the Azure DevOps project (note: project name is not valid).

workItemId.description: The ID of the work item to link to the pull request.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the repository containing the pull request. Do not use the repository name here, use the ID instead.

pullRequestId.description: The ID of the pull request to link to.

pullRequestProjectId.description: The project ID containing the pull request. If not provided, defaults to the work item's project ID (for same-project linking).

tools.name: wit_get_work_items_for_iteration
tools.description: Retrieve a list of work items for a specified iteration.

team.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps team. If not provided, the default team will be used.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

iterationId.description: The ID of the iteration to retrieve work items for.

tools.name: wit_update_work_item
tools.description: Update a work item by ID with specified fields.

id.description: The ID of the work item to update.

op.description: The operation to perform on the field.

path.description: The path of the field to update, e.g., '/fields/System.Title'.

value.description: The new value for the field. This is required for 'Add' and 'Replace' operations, and should be omitted for 'Remove' operations.

updates.description: An array of field updates to apply to the work item.

tools.name: wit_get_work_item_type
tools.description: Get a specific work item type.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

workItemType.description: The name of the work item type to retrieve.

tools.name: wit_create_work_item
tools.description: Create a new work item in a specified project and work item type.

name.description: The name of the field, e.g., 'System.Title'.

format.description: the format of the field value, e.g., 'Html', 'Markdown'. Optional, defaults to 'Html'.

fields.description: A record of field names and values to set on the new work item. Each fild is the field name and each value is the corresponding value to set for that field.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

workItemType.description: The type of work item to create, e.g., 'Task', 'Bug', etc.

tools.name: wit_get_query
tools.description: Get a query by its ID or path.

depth.description: Optional depth parameter to specify how deep to expand the query. Defaults to 0.

query.description: The ID or path of the query to retrieve.

expand.description: Optional expand parameter to include additional details in the response. Defaults to 'None'.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

includeDeleted.description: Whether to include deleted items in the query results. Defaults to false.

useIsoDateFormat.description: Whether to use ISO date format in the response. Defaults to false.

tools.name: wit_get_query_results_by_id
tools.description: Retrieve the results of a work item query given the query ID.

id.description: The ID of the query to retrieve results for.

top.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 50.

team.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps team. If not provided, the default team will be used.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project. If not provided, the default project will be used.

timePrecision.description: Whether to include time precision in the results. Defaults to false.

tools.name: wit_update_work_items_batch
tools.description: Update work items in batch

id.description: The ID of the work item to update.

op.description: The operation to perform on the field.

path.description: The path of the field to update, e.g., '/fields/System.Title'.

value.description: The new value for the field. This is required for 'add' and 'replace' operations, and should be omitted for 'remove' operations.

format.description: The format of the field value. Only to be used for large text fields. e.g., 'Html', 'Markdown'. Optional, defaults to 'Html'.

updates.description: An array of updates to apply to work items. Each update should include the operation (op), work item ID (id), field path (path), and new value (value).

tools.name: wit_work_items_link
tools.description: Link work items together in batch.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

id.description: The ID of the work item to update.

type.description: Type of link to create between the work items. Options include 'parent', 'child', 'duplicate', 'duplicate of', 'related', 'successor', 'predecessor', 'tested by', 'tests', 'affects', and 'affected by'. Defaults to 'related'.

comment.description: Optional comment to include with the link. This can be used to provide additional context for the link being created.

linkToId.description: The ID of the work item to link to.

tools.name: wit_work_item_unlink
tools.description: Remove one or many links from a single work item

id.description: The ID of the work item to remove the links from.

url.description: Optional URL to match for the link to remove. If not provided, all links of the specified type will be removed.

type.description: Type of link to remove. Options include 'parent', 'child', 'duplicate', 'duplicate of', 'related', 'successor', 'predecessor', 'tested by', 'tests', 'affects', 'affected by', and 'artifact'. Defaults to 'related'.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

tools.name: wit_add_artifact_link
tools.description: Add artifact links (repository, branch, commit, builds) to work items. You can either provide the full vstfs URI or the individual components to build it automatically.

buildId.description: The build ID. Required when linkType is 'Build', 'Found in build', or 'Integrated in build'.

comment.description: Comment to include with the artifact link.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

commitId.description: The commit SHA hash. Required when linkType is 'Fixed in Commit'.

linkType.description: Type of artifact link, defaults to 'Branch'. This determines both the link type and how to build the VSTFS URI from individual components.

projectId.description: The project ID (GUID) containing the artifact. Required for Git artifacts when artifactUri is not provided.

branchName.description: The branch name (e.g., 'main'). Required when linkType is 'Branch'.

workItemId.description: The ID of the work item to add the artifact link to.

artifactUri.description: The complete VSTFS URI of the artifact to link. If provided, individual component parameters are ignored.

repositoryId.description: The repository ID (GUID) containing the artifact. Required for Git artifacts when artifactUri is not provided.

pullRequestId.description: The pull request ID. Required when linkType is 'Pull Request'.

tools.name: wiki_get_wiki
tools.description: Get the wiki by wikiIdentifier

project.description: The project name or ID where the wiki is located. If not provided, the default project will be used.

wikiIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the wiki.

tools.name: wiki_list_wikis
tools.description: Retrieve a list of wikis for an organization or project.

project.description: The project name or ID to filter wikis. If not provided, all wikis in the organization will be returned.

tools.name: wiki_list_pages
tools.description: Retrieve a list of wiki pages for a specific wiki and project.

top.description: The maximum number of pages to return. Defaults to 20.

project.description: The project name or ID where the wiki is located.

wikiIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the wiki.

pageViewsForDays.description: Number of days to retrieve page views for. If not specified, page views are not included.

continuationToken.description: Token for pagination to retrieve the next set of pages.

tools.name: wiki_get_page
tools.description: Retrieve wiki page metadata by path. This tool does not return page content.

path.description: The path of the wiki page (e.g., '/Home' or '/Documentation/Setup').

project.description: The project name or ID where the wiki is located.

recursionLevel.description: Recursion level for subpages. 'None' returns only the specified page. 'OneLevel' includes direct children. 'Full' includes all descendants.

wikiIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the wiki.

tools.name: wiki_get_page_content
tools.description: Retrieve wiki page content. Provide either a 'url' parameter OR the combination of 'wikiIdentifier' and 'project' parameters.

url.description: The full URL of the wiki page to retrieve content for. If provided, wikiIdentifier, project, and path are ignored. Supported patterns: https://dev.azure.com/{org}/{project}/_wiki/wikis/{wikiIdentifier}?pagePath=%2FMy%20Page and https://dev.azure.com/{org}/{project}/_wiki/wikis/{wikiIdentifier}/{pageId}/Page-Title

path.description: The path of the wiki page to retrieve content for. Optional, defaults to root page if not provided.

project.description: The project name or ID where the wiki is located. Required if url is not provided.

wikiIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the wiki. Required if url is not provided.

tools.name: wiki_create_or_update_page
tools.description: Create or update a wiki page with content.

etag.description: ETag for editing existing pages (optional, will be fetched if not provided).

path.description: The path of the wiki page (e.g., '/Home' or '/Documentation/Setup').

branch.description: The branch name for the wiki repository. Defaults to 'wikiMaster' which is the default branch for Azure DevOps wikis.

content.description: The content of the wiki page in markdown format.

project.description: The project name or ID where the wiki is located. If not provided, the default project will be used.

wikiIdentifier.description: The unique identifier or name of the wiki.

tools.name: testplan_list_test_plans
tools.description: Retrieve a paginated list of test plans from an Azure DevOps project. Allows filtering for active plans and toggling detailed information.

project.description: The unique identifier (ID or name) of the Azure DevOps project.

continuationToken.description: Token to continue fetching test plans from a previous request.

filterActivePlans.description: Filter to include only active test plans. Defaults to true.

includePlanDetails.description: Include detailed information about each test plan.

tools.name: testplan_create_test_plan
tools.description: Creates a new test plan in the project.

name.description: The name of the test plan to be created.

endDate.description: The end date of the test plan

project.description: The unique identifier (ID or name) of the Azure DevOps project where the test plan will be created.

areaPath.description: The area path for the test plan

iteration.description: The iteration path for the test plan

startDate.description: The start date of the test plan

description.description: The description of the test plan

tools.name: testplan_create_test_suite
tools.description: Creates a new test suite in a test plan.

name.description: Name of the child test suite

planId.description: ID of the test plan that contains the suites

project.description: Project ID or project name

parentSuiteId.description: ID of the parent suite under which the new suite will be created, if not given by user this can be id of a root suite of the test plan

tools.name: testplan_add_test_cases_to_suite
tools.description: Adds existing test cases to a test suite.

planId.description: The ID of the test plan.

project.description: The unique identifier (ID or name) of the Azure DevOps project.

suiteId.description: The ID of the test suite.

testCaseIds.description: The ID(s) of the test case(s) to add.

tools.name: testplan_create_test_case
tools.description: Creates a new test case work item.

steps.description:
The steps to reproduce the test case. Make sure to format each step as '1. Step one|Expected result one
2. Step two|Expected result two. USE '|' as the delimiter between step and expected result. DO NOT use '|' in the description of the step or expected result.

title.description: The title of the test case.

project.description: The unique identifier (ID or name) of the Azure DevOps project.

areaPath.description: The area path for the test case.

priority.description: The priority of the test case.

iterationPath.description: The iteration path for the test case.

testsWorkItemId.description: Optional work item id that will be set as a Microsoft.VSTS.Common.TestedBy-Reverse link to the test case.

tools.name: testplan_update_test_case_steps
tools.description: Update an existing test case work item.

id.description: The ID of the test case work item to update.

steps.description:
The steps to reproduce the test case. Make sure to format each step as '1. Step one|Expected result one
2. Step two|Expected result two. USE '|' as the delimiter between step and expected result. DO NOT use '|' in the description of the step or expected result.

tools.name: testplan_list_test_cases
tools.description: Gets a list of test cases in the test plan.

planid.description: The ID of the test plan.

project.description: The unique identifier (ID or name) of the Azure DevOps project.

suiteid.description: The ID of the test suite.

tools.name: testplan_show_test_results_from_build_id
tools.description: Gets a list of test results for a given project and build ID.

project.description: The unique identifier (ID or name) of the Azure DevOps project.

tools.name: search_code
tools.description: Search Azure DevOps Repositories for a given search text

top.description: Maximum number of results to return

project.description: Filter by projects

searchText.description: Keywords to search for in code repositories

includeFacets.description: Include facets in the search results

tools.name: search_wiki
tools.description: Search Azure DevOps Wiki for a given search text

top.description: Maximum number of results to return

project.description: Filter by projects

searchText.description: Keywords to search for wiki pages

includeFacets.description: Include facets in the search results

tools.name: search_workitem
tools.description: Get Azure DevOps Work Item search results for a given search text

top.description: Number of results to return

skip.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

project.description: Filter by projects

searchText.description: Search text to find in work items

includeFacets.description: Include facets in the search results

tools.name: advsec_get_alerts
tools.description: Retrieve Advanced Security alerts for a repository.

ref.description: Filter alerts by git reference (branch). If not provided and onlyDefaultBranch is true, only includes alerts from default branch.

top.description: Maximum number of alerts to return. Defaults to 100.

states.description: Filter alerts by state. If not specified, returns alerts in any state.

orderBy.description: Order results by specified field. Defaults to 'severity'.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

validity.description: Filter alerts by validity status. Only applicable for secret alerts.

alertType.description: Filter alerts by type. If not specified, returns all alert types.

repository.description: The name or ID of the repository to get alerts for.

severities.description: Filter alerts by severity level. If not specified, returns alerts at any severity.

confidenceLevels.description: Filter alerts by confidence levels. Only applicable for secret alerts. Defaults to both 'high' and 'other'.

onlyDefaultBranch.description: If true, only return alerts found on the default branch. Defaults to true.

tools.name: advsec_get_alert_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Advanced Security alert.

ref.description: Git reference (branch) to filter the alert.

alertId.description: The ID of the alert to retrieve details for.

project.description: The name or ID of the Azure DevOps project.

repository.description: The name or ID of the repository containing the alert.
